channel.title: Version History on
channel.description: Recent content in Version History on

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.6 2022-10-04
item.description: [1.4.6] - 2022-10-04 # Optimal # Map: Fixed the issue of marker display when moving Camera: Optimized display of device list Alert configuration: Optimized configuration of GPS signal loss alarm

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.5 2022-10-01
item.description: [1.4.5] - 2022-10-01 # Optimal # Map: Device list: fix searching by device group Optimize display of multiple devices Change the color of the geographical area name Fixed the issue of marker display when moving Added daily mileage refresh feature Camera: Fix playback error Optimized display of device list Alert configuration: Optimized configuration of GPS signal loss alarm Optimize device selection and geographic region Folder tree: Add collapse function

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.4 2022-09-26
item.description: [1.4.4] - 2022-09-26 # Add New # Map page for distributors Enable display by default | Sub-accounts | Favourite Group by Default | Group | Geographical area Display up to 200 devices Optimal # Report: General report by day: supplementing fuel norm Folder tree: Add collapse function Review: Filter out but points with lat,lng = 0 Travel time control report: handle error when duration = 0s

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.3 2022-09-20
item.description: [1.4.3] - 2022-09-20 # Add New # Document Management Expense management Report: Add detailed Signal Loss report Add expired device report Fuel: added report Consumption by KM(day) Additional user history Optimal # Report: General report by day, adding time and number of signal loss General report by vehicle, adding time and number of signal loss Remind: Optimized reminder configuration Warning Rule: Added warning type Loss of satellite signal/Normal satellite signal Optimized device log report

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.2 2022-09-07
item.description: [1.4.2] - 2022-09-07 # Add New # Warning Rule: Add alert for camera Add warning for driving more than 4 hours continuously Added device reconnection warning Optimal # Select device: Fixed the issue of selecting a device in a group with 1 device Fix bug when changing user Fix camera: Update using camera server Added Streamax camera type Fix device: Added camera signal loss time management (timoutCamera) Sensor configuration: allows to configure min rise / min fall time User tree: Optimize update total number of devices Fixed default language selection when logging out Optimized reminder management

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.1 2022-08-17
item.description: [1.4.1] - 2022-08-17 # Added # Ticket Report SIM report SIM warranty feature Report bonus points to agents Fixed # Map: Display style list of devices by group, geographical area Review the color display route by speed Device Management: Add installation signal management Optimized alert configuration Optimizing extended configuration parameters Department: Add configuration to receive notifications for departments Ticket:

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.0 2022-07-05
item.description: [1.4.0] - 2022-07-05 # Add new Add Ticket . report Optimal Map: Fixed display of geofence name when - Change zoom Added display style Horizontal Icons Department: Add configuration to receive notifications for departments Tickets: Fix showing ticket list with account not showing account tree Support search by sub-account Map API key: Add type of api key GoTrack - VN Beta Warning rules: Add warning to stop turning on the air conditioner.

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.9 2022-06-21
item.description: [1.3.9] - 2022-06-21 # Add new SIM card warranty: Additional warranty sim module SIM management: Added SIM report and renewal fee Change Map configuration: Allows to configure the display area Show marker preview Map: Display geofence name with zoom level >= 11 Device info box: Added on/off sensor type display Fix sensor: Additional type of on/off sensor Optimal History - Change device: Allow searching by sub-account.

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.8 2022-06-10
item.description: [1.3.8] - 2022-06-10 # Add new Sim management: Add sim and charge report Trading report: Installation activities Device Information: Support quick search information by imei for technical support Change Trading report: Grouping business reports into 1 page Menu interface: Add top menu layout interface Optimal Map page: Fix the display of map settings and display information Fixed the bug of enabling/disabling the full map.

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.7 2022-06-02
item.description: [1.3.7] - 2022-06-02 # Add new Trading report: Transaction summary Summary of transactions - GPS Transaction summary - Camera Transaction Summary - Addon Status statistics Change Infobox: Hide service term display Camera: Show error if any and update time Device search: Show service term Equipment management : Added ccid display (default to hide) Optimal Fixed a bug where the vehicle status color was displayed according to the map interface Menu interface-2: fix selected menu color error
